entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new $ hexo new "My New Post"
More info: Writing Run server$ hexo server
More info: Server Generate static files$ hexo generate
More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy
More info: Deployment

entry.title: 待做事项
entry.content: 第67天(2025.12.9) jndi注入 额 前边的开发课程忘了 看不太懂 后边重新看一遍

entry.title: 我的第一篇博客
entry.content: hexo搭建的个人博客测试 发现记不住东西，时常需要看别人的笔记来复习，很抓马啊 遂决定自己开始写一写 划划水 方便自己复习 同时加强一下自己的理解
